title: Herman Van Rompuy
summary: Herman Achille, Count Van Rompuy[1] (Dutch pronunciation: [ˈɦɛrmɑn vɑn ˈrɔmpœy]); born 31 October 1947) is a Belgian politician, who served as Prime Minister of Belgium from 2008 to 2009 and then as the first permanent President of the European Council from 2009 to 2014.
